'''1.20.5 Release Candidate 3''' (known as '''1.20.5-rc3''' in the launcher) is the third and final release candidate for [[Java Edition 1.20.5]], released on April 22, 2024,<ref>{{mcnet|minecraft-1-20-5-release-candidate-3|Minecraft 1.20.5 Release Candidate 3|April 22, 2024}}</ref> which fixes a bug.

{{fixes|fixedin=1.20.5 Release Candidate 3
